function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low support for COVID-19 mitigation measures","Impact":"Increased risk of non-compliance and disease spread","Mitigation":"Public health education, community engagement, and clear communication","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, social media outreach","People":"General public, non-compliant individuals","Owner":"Government health authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Poor compliance due to perceived negative impact","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and non-compliance","Mitigation":"Addressing misconceptions, providing support for impacted individuals, and creating incentives for compliance","Technologies":"Education and awareness campaigns, mental health support services, incentive programs","People":"General public, individuals experiencing negative impact","Owner":"Government health authorities, mental health organizations, community groups"},{"Description":"Low morale due to negative emotions","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health issues and reduced adherence to measures","Mitigation":"Mental health support services, promoting positive coping strategies, and community support networks","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps, community forums","People":"General public, individuals experiencing negative emotions","Owner":"Mental health organizations, community groups"}]}
